mapper.select: SELECT tr.id, tu.real_name AS registerName, tc.competition_name AS competitionName, tr.audit_status AS auditStatus FROM t_register tr JOIN t_user tu ON tr.user_id = tu.id AND tu.del_status = 0 JOIN t_competition tc ON tr.competition_id = tc.id AND tc.del_status = 0 WHERE tr.id = #{registerId} AND tr.del_status = 0
